StringTable.Label: QuasiSpaceCivilizationCapital_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=WobbleWorldIcon] QuasiSpace Civilization Capital

StringTable.Label: QuasiSpaceCivilizationCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Colony capital that is imprisoned under an Ur-Quan slave shield.

StringTable.Label: QuasiSpaceCivilizationCapital_Dec
StringTable.String: Disallows building a shipyard. Colonial capital does a little bit of everything and serves as a stepping stone to greater things.

StringTable.Label: TeleportPlanet_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=ShieldedWorldIcon] Realign QuasiSpace Portals

StringTable.Label: TeleportPlanet_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Realigns QuasiSpace Portal nodes seemingly teleporting the planet.

StringTable.Label: TeleportPlanet_Dec
StringTable.String: Realigns QuasiSpace Portal nodes that causes QuasiSpace Portals to appear at different positions in TrueSpace with the planet having a random entry point.

StringTable.Label: EnslavedColonyCapital_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=ShieldedWorldIcon] Enslaved Colony Capital

StringTable.Label: EnslavedColonyCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides the basic needs for shielded planet.

StringTable.Label: EnslavedColonyCapital_Dec
StringTable.String: Colony capital that is imprisoned under an Ur-Quan slave shield. Disallows building a shipyard. Colonial capital does a little bit of everything and serves as a stepping stone to greater things.

StringTable.Label: EnslavedCivilizationCapital_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=ShieldedWorldIcon] Enslaved Civilization Capital

StringTable.Label: EnslavedCivilizationCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Colony capital that is imprisoned under an Ur-Quan slave shield.

StringTable.Label: EnslavedCivilizationCapital_Dec
StringTable.String: Disallows building a shipyard. Colonial capital does a little bit of everything and serves as a stepping stone to greater things.

StringTable.Label: SpathiCivilizationCapital_Name
StringTable.String: [ICON=ShieldedWorldIcon] Spathi Civilization Capital

StringTable.Label: SpathiCivilizationCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: The Ur-Quan slave shield was set up by the Spathi themselves.

StringTable.Label: SpathiCivilizationCapital_Dec
StringTable.String: Civilization capital that is imprisoned under an Ur-Quan slave shield. Disallows building a shipyard.

StringTable.Label: FreeColonyCapital_Name
StringTable.String: Free Colony Capital

StringTable.Label: FreeColonyCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Colony that has had its Ur-Quan slave shield removed.

StringTable.Label: FreeColonyCapital_Dec
StringTable.String: Colony that has had its Ur-Quan slave shield removed. The population feels uplifted after this event.

StringTable.Label: FreeSpathiColonyCapital_Name
StringTable.String: Free Colony Capital

StringTable.Label: FreeSpathiColonyCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Pranked nomad Spathi removed the slave shield.

StringTable.Label: FreeSpathiColonyCapital_Dec
StringTable.String: Umgah have done it again. Spathi that were left outside Spathiwa's slave shield were given false directions on how to get inside.
